page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content: THERE IS A PLAY GROUP THAT MEETS THREE TIMES A WEEK AT THE METHODIST CHURCH. THE TEA POT CLUB MEETS EVERY TUESDAY AT THE CHURCH HALL FROM 2 TIL 3.15.THERE ARE MANY TOYS FOR THE CHILDREN TO PLAY WITH WHILE MUMS CAN HAVE A CHAT. THE AFTER-8 CLUB,WOMENS INSTITUTE,AND UNITED WOMENS FELLOWSHIP MEET EACH MONTH.THERE IS AN OVER 60's CLUB,AND A YOUTH CLUB FOR CHILDREN.THE YOUTH CLUB MEETS ON WEDNESDAYS AND CHILDREN PLAY GAMES,LISTEN TO THE RADIO AND EAT SWEETS.YOU CAN PLAY THE FOLLOWING SPORTS:BADMINTON,NETBALL,FOOTBALL, ROUNDERS AND WEIGHTLIFTING.CRICKET IS PLAYED BY A TEAM FROM KETTERING ON THE PLAYING FIELDS. THERE IS AN HISTORICAL SOCIETY,CAMERA CLUB AND ANGLING CLUB.THE WORKING MENS CLUB IS ALSO VERY POPULAR.
